Get a demo Log in Sign up for free Sign up for free Log in The RITZ Ybor Get verified emails for The RITZ Ybor employees Profile Email Format About The RITZ Ybor The RITZ Ybor is a historic theater built in 1917 that has become Tampa Bay's leading venue for live music, special events, private and weekly parties. Offering over 17,000 sf of indoor event space amid three unique rooms, The RITZ Ybor is conveniently located in the heart of Tampa Bay's entertainment and nightlife district. Box Office: (813) 247-3729 | [email¬†protected] Please visit us online: www.theritzybor.com Follow us on Twitter & Instagram: @theritzybor see more Website http://www.theritzybor.com Employees 11-50 employees View all The RITZ Ybor employees Industry Events Services Headquarter 1503 East 7th Avenue,Tampa,FL,US Founded 2008 Keywords Private Parties, Weddings, Special Events, Fundraisers, Live Concerts, Corporate Parties Get verified email of The RITZ Ybor employees The RITZ Ybor Alternatives Elite Exhibits, a Gielissen Company events services Save On Crafts Events Services CXOsync events services Big Fish Promotions LLC events services NMR Events events services Town & Country Caterers Events Services Genuine Events events services ABCOMRENTS.COM events services The RITZ Ybor Staff Directory LT Louden Tucker Director of Safety And Security View View +4-********20 ******@theritzybor.com CR Chelsea Rawl Venue Manager View View +3-********18 ******@theritzybor.com DP Drue Pines Resident Photographer View View +4-********16 ******@theritzybor.com Download the complete 2025 The RITZ Ybor Employee List ED Erika Dam Bottle Server View View +5-********04 ******@theritzybor.com NP Nicholas Pastrana Security Professional View View +6-********16 ******@theritzybor.com Search The RITZ Ybor Staff Directory Find accurate personal emails, work emails and phone numbers for employees Search Supercharge your Prospecting & Outreach with ContactOut Supercharge your Prospecting & Outreach with ContactOut Search Portal Find countless prospects outside of LinkedIn fast Accelerate prospecting with instant access to 300M professionals from 30M companies with the right contact details. Buckethead - The RITZ Ybor Skip to main content Hit enter to search or ESC to close Close Search twitter facebook instagram search Menu search Menu EVENTS Past Events GUEST LIST PHOTOS ABOUT Employment Holiday Rentals Visit Sunset Events Visit Sunset Music Festival CONTACT Buckethead September 11, 2025 | The RITZ Ybor | Tampa, FL | 7:00 pm - 11:00 pm Buy Tickets RSVP on Facebook AEG Presents BUCKETHEAD Thursday, September 11, 2025 Doors: 7pm ‚Ä¢ Show: 8pm üéü Get Tickets! bit.ly/buckethead0911 The RITZ Ybor 1503 E 7th Ave ‚Äì Tampa, FL 33605 www.theritzybor.com More Info: bucketheadpikes.com ‚Ä¢ aegpresents.com ‚Ä¢ sunsettampa.com ** PLEASE NOTE that we cannot guarantee the authenticity or validity of tickets purchased from any unauthorized third-party ticket sites (StubHub, Seat Geek, Vivid Seats, Feverup, TickPick, Eventify, etc) as well as from individual sellers on Facebook or Instagram. All tickets purchased from those sites and sellers are purchased at the buyer‚Äôs own risk. For guaranteed valid tickets, please purchase only from ticket links on sunsettampa.com and theritzybor.com. We also strongly suggest purchasing tickets in advance to avoid a sellout. PARKING: The Centro Ybor Parking Garage is located behind our venue, and numerous paid lots and street parking are available on 15th Street and in the surrounding area. DRESS CODE & BAG POLICY: Our dress code is casual: shirt and shoes are required. No backpacks, book bags, camelbaks, large purses, or bandanas are allowed inside the venue. For security purposes, all bags are subject to inspection upon entry. NO OUTSIDE FOOD & BEVERAGES: Our venue has a full service bar. While we do not serve food, there are numerous dining options within immediate walking distance surrounding the venue. ADA: The RITZ Ybor does not have a designated ADA section, but our venue is fully wheelchair accessible, and we accommodate certain types of medical equipment. For specific inquiries or assistance, please feel free to email us at events@theritzybor.com . CAMERA POLICY: No professional audio, video, or audio recording equipment is allowed inside the venue including any camera with a detachable lens or tripod setup. For press pass access, please contact the artist and their management directly. For all questions, email us at events@theritzybor.com . Sunset Events Tickets & Schedule - Tampa Dance Music and Concerts Skip to main content Hit enter to search or ESC to close Close Search twitter facebook instagram search Menu search Menu EVENTS Past Events GUEST LIST PHOTOS ABOUT Employment Holiday Rentals Visit Sunset Events Visit Sunset Music Festival CONTACT About / The History Behind The RITZ Ybor The RITZ Ybor is Tampa‚Äôs most sought-after venue for live music and special events, and serves as the official home and headquarters of Sunset Events . Originally constructed in 1917 as the Rivoli Theatre, the RITZ Ybor underwent various renovations in the 1930s to expand and become the Ritz Theatre. Over the decades, it has transformed from a silent movie theatre to a playhouse, nightclub, and now a premier concert venue. In 2008, it officially reopened as the RITZ Ybor, showcasing its rich history and modern features. Situated in the heart of the historic Ybor City district, the RITZ Ybor is just a short trolley ride away from the Water Street district, within 2-3 miles from downtown Tampa, and is only a 15-minute car ride from the Tampa International Airport. Since its reopening in 2008, the RITZ Ybor has hosted high-profile events such as Super Bowl parties, national product launch parties, and sold-out concerts from acclaimed artists like Lady Gaga, Imagine Dragons, Kendrick Lamar, Skrillex, and more. Sunset Events has made the RITZ Ybor its home since 2016, further cementing the venue‚Äôs status as a leading destination for unforgettable live music and special events in Tampa. The RITZ Ybor is located at 1503 East 7th Avenue in Tampa, FL. ABOUT SUNSET EVENTS For over 2 decades, Sunset Events has dominated the dance music industry with top events, festivals, and promotions in Tampa Bay and Central Florida. Owner John Santoro started this endeavor back in 1995, and Sunset Events has produced over 150 events each year along with its annual music festival, Sunset Music Festival . Sunset Events has featured hundreds of world-class artists: Ti√´sto, Deadmau5, Skrillex, Illenium, Excision, The Chainsmokers, Zedd, Above & Beyond, RL Grime, NF, 21 Savage, Porter Robinson, Steve Aoki, Hardwell, Paul van Dyk, Armin Van Buuren, Paul Oakenfold, Benny Benassi, Carnage, 6lack, Juice Wrld, Oliver Heldens, Adventure Club, Dillon Francis, Borgore, Zeds Dead, Malaa, Slander, NGHTMRE, Pauly D, Flosstradamus just to name a few. For more info about Sunset Events, please visit: sunsettampa.com . VENUE POLICIES General Admission: We are a STANDING ROOM venue. No outside seating is permitted. For questions related to ADA, please see below for wheel chair accessibility or send us an email at events@theritzybor.com . Dress Code & Bag Policy: Our dress code is casual: shirt and shoes are required. No backpacks, book bags, camelbaks, large purses, or bandanas are allowed inside the venue. ADA: The RITZ Ybor does not have a designated ADA section, but our venue is fully wheelchair accessible, and we accommodate certain types of medical equipment. For specific inquiries or assistance, please feel free to email us at events@theritzybor.com . Age Limit: Age limits vary per show, but our weekly Pound Friday and Sunset Saturday events are ages 18+. Please check each event‚Äôs age limit in the event description. ID Policy: For shows that are ages 18+, and for guests who are ages 21+ and wish to consume alcohol, a physical and valid ID will be required upon entry. Valid forms of ID include non-expired Drivers License, state issued Identification Cards, Military ID, or a flipbook Passport. Photocopies of Identification are not allowed or permitted. Camera Policy: No professional audio, video, or audio recording equipment is allowed inside the venue including any camera with a detachable lens or tripod setup. For press pass access, please contact the artist and their management directly. Pet Policy: For the safety of both pets and our guests, pets of any kind are NOT permitted in the venue. However, SERVICE ANIMALS are allowed, though we strongly recommend only bringing them if absolutely necessary, as the loud music and large crowd could be overwhelming. Our priority is ensuring a safe environment for everyone. If you have specific questions regarding service animals, please feel free to email us at events@theritzybor.com . Third Party Tickets: We¬†cannot guarantee the authenticity or validity of tickets purchased from individual sellers on Facebook or Instagram, as well as tickets purchased from StubHub, Seat Geek, Vivid Seats, Front Row Tickets, Tickets Center, TicketsOnSale.com, or any other unauthorized third-party ticket selling site. For guaranteed valid tickets, please purchase only from ticket links via sunsettampa.com and theritzybor.com. We also strongly suggest purchasing tickets in advance to avoid a sellout. The RITZ Ybor 1503 E 7th Ave ‚Äì Tampa, FL 33605 www.theritzybor.com More Info: lennypearce.com ‚Ä¢ livenation.com ‚Ä¢ noclubs.com ‚Ä¢ sunsettampa.com ** PLEASE NOTE that we cannot guarantee the authenticity or validity of tickets purchased from any unauthorized third-party ticket sites (StubHub, Seat Geek, Vivid Seats, Feverup, TickPick, Eventify, etc) as well as from individual sellers on Facebook or Instagram. PARKING: The Centro Ybor Parking Garage is located behind our venue, and numerous paid lots and street parking are available on 15th Street and in the surrounding area. DRESS CODE & BAG POLICY: Our dress code is casual: shirt and shoes are required. No backpacks, book bags, camelbaks, large purses, or bandanas are allowed inside the venue. For security purposes, all bags are subject to inspection upon entry. NO OUTSIDE FOOD & BEVERAGES: Our venue has a full service bar. While we do not serve food, there are numerous dining options within immediate walking distance surrounding the venue. ADA: The RITZ Ybor does not have a designated ADA section, but our venue is fully wheelchair accessible, and we accommodate certain types of medical equipment. For specific inquiries or assistance, please feel free to email us at events@theritzybor.com. CAMERA POLICY: No professional audio, video, or audio recording equipment is allowed inside the venue including any camera with a detachable lens or tripod setup. For press pass access, please contact the artist and their management directly. For all questions, email us at events@theritzybor.com .
